content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to negotiating the rental price, but I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible value for my property. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. I would like to move in as soon as possible. How can I make the payment and when do I have to move in?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: That is a very reasonable offer and I am willing to accept it. You can make the payment monthly in advance, or you can make a lump sum payment upfront. As for when you can move in, that would depend on my schedule and availability. I can work with you to find a convenient move-in date.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can I move in on the 1st of next month?
I will make the payment monthly in advance.
I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
Thank you for your help and support.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Yes, you can move in on the 1st of next month. I will send you the lease agreement as soon as possible for you to sign. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
